text: Thank you Jackie. I have a design suggestion for the Features area. Because sometimes little text description leaves a lot of whitepace below it.
Hi guys I've tried the new theme verification functionality in local and this is the results. Any idea for solve the errors?
Hey Jacob! Yep, I've actually already added that to our list of tweaks! We're also going to make the image slightly larger. Thanks for sharing!

Sorry for the delayed response this is much different then how I would do it something def looks wrong. I suggest asking your question again in say the hubl and template channels and post the images you shared with me. Sorry I couldn't be more help.
Hey Jacob. The issue in the theme description should be fixed. Let us know if youâ€™re still have issues.
